SEARCH
Package gw.api.admin

Class ImportDataInfo

java.lang.Object
gw.api.admin.ImportDataInfo
public class ImportDataInfo extends Object
Information about the import of an XML data file. Allows an XML file to be imported and tracks which entities changed as a result of the import. A resolution strategy can be specified to decide whether the changes should overwrite the existing data, be discarded or decided manually case by case. Provides a commit changes method which applies the imported changes according to the selected resolution strategy.

    • setFile

      public void setFile(WebFile file)
      Import the given file and build a list of conflicts, where the imported data differs from the current data. Also stores any import errors for retrieval via getErrorString.
      Parameters:
      file - the file of XML data to import
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - if the file import fails catastrophically

    • importFromInputStream

      protected void importFromInputStream(InputStream in)

    • importFromInputStream

      protected void importFromInputStream(Reader reader)

    • commitChanges

      public boolean commitChanges()
      Commit the imported data according to the current resolution strategy. Overwrite will accept all the imported changes, overwriting the existing data. Discard will discard the imported changes and leave the existing data unchanged. Manual will use whatever resolution was chosen for each individual conflict.
      Returns:
      true if there was not error on the commit

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Cancels the import.
